titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of April 21 through April 27, 2024, as "National Crime Victims Rights Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of April 21 through April 27, 2024, as "National Crime Victims Rights Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Crime Victims' Rights Week and its themeâ€”How would you help? Options, services, and hope for crime survivors.
